title: Elon Musk Seeks Support Against Rules on Free Speech Online
description: During a tour in Europe to make a Neuralink announcement, Musk's real goal became apparent: Stop the European Commission’s proposed measures regarding online content moderation.

title: How to Tackle AI—and Cheating—in the Classroom
description: What one educator wants students, teachers, and everyone else to know about the ethics of using of AI in education.

title: Love That Song? Buy Shares in It
description: A Swedish platform promises to help fund your favorite artists while making you rich and saving the music industry.
